buddy_profile.name: Dominica Drazal
buddy_profile.title: Communications & Partnerships for Start-Ups in Emerging Markets
buddy_profile.introduction: Raised in the Middle East by Eastern European parents, I was surrounded by layers of diversity. Extensive traveling throughout my childhood stimulated a fascination for cultures, languages and geopolitics, and I continued living a pseudo-nomadic life as an adult. While I began my career on the trading floor in NYC, I later worked in Africa, Asia, Europe and South America in diverse roles (investments, micro-finance, communications, and business development). Fluent in five languages, I graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and later completed a Masters in International Affairs from Fletcher (Tufts), and have a number of Sustainability related certificates.

background.upbringing: Middle East, raised by Eastern European parents
background.childhood: Extensive traveling, surrounded by layers of diversity

education: Masters in International Affairs from Fletcher (Tufts)
buddy_profile.how_to_help: Since I have extremely diverse experience, I could help Matcha users with perspective, thinking out of the box, and finding partners. I am also keen to help them find their purpose and create supporting marketing & communication materials.
buddy_profile.sustainability_motivation: Growing up my parents exposed me to the concept of sustainability before it was coined as such. Exposed to the world and its injustices, but more importantly, its potential, I purposefully looked for ways in which I could make an impact, both professionally and personally. I have worked "on the field" for multi-lateral organisations and NGOs as well as for large private-sector financial and consulting groups: learning to "see" sustainability from both perspectives has been powerful in creating unity, partnerships and action oriented programs.
buddy_profile.dual_perspective: Learning to 'see' sustainability from both NGO and private-sector perspectives has been powerful in creating unity, partnerships and action oriented programs
buddy_profile.organizational_responsibilities: As a communicator, editor, and marketer, I have learned to harness the power of words and positioning to drive change in perspective, direction and action. I have encouraged colleagues or partners to consider the human and environmental elements in their decision making processes, recognising that most people are unaware but not uninterested.
buddy_profile.approach: Harness power of words and positioning to drive change
buddy_profile.philosophy: Most people are unaware but not uninterested
buddy_profile.challenges_and_solutions: Learning how to balance an immediate emotional need to react with a practical approach based on strategy and reason, while appreciated the cultural insights.
buddy_profile.proudest_achievement: Taking my son on multiple impact trips in which he was exposed to the realities faced by his peers in other countries around the globe. Pushing up his sleeves, he built, taught and grew as a human. I am proud that he, as a representative of the next generation, is aware, responsible and proactive in pushing forward sustainability.

next_generation_impact.outcome: Son is aware, responsible and proactive in pushing forward sustainability
